programme.desc: Labi ajaloo on inimesed oma surnuid matnud. Kas meil on loomuparane vajadus oma minevikku valja kaevata? Mida me otsime ja millised sugavad saladused jaavad haudadesse peitu?

programme.title: Pandikunnid
programme.desc: Kas Chum laseb oma hambad kaiku, kui siseneb klient "Elavate surnute" naitlejate autogrammidega kujukeste kollektsiooniga? Corey tunneb end hasti, kui pandimajja ilmub Rock n Roll High Schooli plakat. Kas tehing on muusika tema kõrvadele?

programme.title: Oksjonikutid
programme.desc: Ton ja Allen tulitsevad Catalina saarel toimuval haruldasel oksjonil pakkumisstrateegia parast ning peavad kiirustama, et maha laadida uhemeheline sukelaparaat, mis võib olla vaart raha... kui nad suudavad selle toole panna.

programme.title: Oksjonikutid
programme.desc: Kui vigastus jatab Alleni kõrvale, jaab ta poodi, samal ajal kui Ton viib Big Sisi oksjonile ja laheb hoogu, ignoreerides Alleni nõuandeid ja tehes riskantseid oste, mis võivad partneritele paaditaie sularaha maksma minna.

programme.title: Oksjonikutid
programme.desc: Kui ruhm patte uritab Toni ja Allenit Hiinalinna oksjonilt valja suruda, võitlevad poisid vastu, mille tulemuseks on vagivaldne kokkupõrge ja nii haruldase Borneo puhkpussi kui ka eriefektide trossirakmete leidmine.

programme.title: William Shatneriga seletamatutes paikades
programme.desc: Sajandeid on arheoloogidel ja maadeuurijatel olnud kinnisideeks ajas kadunud iidsete linnade leidmine. Kuidas saab kunagisest õitsvast kogukonnast kadunud linn? Ja kui nende varemed leitakse, siis milliseid saladusi võivad need inimajaloost avaldada?

programme.title: Lahingud ladude parast
programme.desc: Jarrod ja Brandi saavad omale vaikese tooriistakomplekti. Barry jaab oksjonile hiljaks ja loob kampa uhe tagasihoidliku panustajaga. Mark Balelo lahkub oksjonilt suure printeriga, aga kas see toob talle ka suurt tulu?

programme.title: Lahingud ladude parast
programme.desc: Barryle kukub Orangeis Californias kapp selga. Ivy Calvin sobrab prugis ja leiab nii mõndagi. Jarrod ja Brandi võidavad uhe lao, kuid kas nad ka teenivad selle pealt?

programme.title: Lahingud ladude parast
programme.desc: Laooksjonid on kõige uuem ja suurem avastamata viis otsida kadunud aardeid. Auahned inimesed teevad panuseid mahajaetud varale, lootes sattuda kullasoonele. Tere tulemast lahingutesse ladude parast!

programme.title: William Shatneriga seletamatutes paikades
programme.desc: Kõikjal maailmas on kohti ja esemeid, mida peetakse neetuks. Kas needused on pelgalt liigse kujutlusvõime tulemus või on võimalik, et needused on reaalsed ja mangus on tumedad jõud, mis ei allu seletusele?

programme.title: Pandikunnid
programme.desc: Kui Chum saab katte unikaalse tooli, kas Rick pigistab silmad kinni tema kulutuste ule? Rick avab Salvador Dali kokaraamatu ja saab irreaalse idee - korraldada õhtusoogipidu. Aga kui asjad muutuvad kiiresti kahtlaseks, kas siis Rick sulab surve all?

programme.title: Oak Islandi needus
programme.desc: Samal ajal, kui puurimisoperatsioon jõuab sihtkohale uha lahemale, on meeskonnaliikmed šokis, kui nad avastavad tõendeid iidse seifi kohta.

programme.title: Iidsed tulnukad
programme.desc: 20. sajandi alguses vaitis Edgar, et sai transis olles nagemusi minevikust ja tulevikust, ta tervendas haigeid ja vaidetavalt oli tal kohtumisi maavaliste olenditega. Kas võib olla, et ta oli anum, mida kasutati tulnukate kavade elluviimiseks?

programme.title: Iidsed tulnukad
programme.desc: Üksnes Charles Darwini evolutsiooniteooria põhjal tundub tanapaeva inimese kiire areng võimatu ilma "puuduva lulita". Kas see luli võib olla seotud maavalise sekkumisega?

programme.title: Oksjonikutid
programme.desc: Saadaval on krossimootorratas ja haruldane karjapiits ning Ton ja Allen seisavad vastamisi uhe seni kõvema konkurendiga: nende endisel tootajal Carolynil, kes teab kõiki nende nippe, on raha põletada ja ta tahab kattemaksu.

programme.title: Oksjonikutid
programme.desc: Ton ja Allen võitlevad paari tigeda naissoost oksjonikutiga, kes on vimma tais ja teevad pakkumisi pigem õeluse kui strateegia alusel. Ning Gatlingi relv ja soomusruu on palju vahem vaart, kui poisid ootasid.

programme.title: Oksjonikutid
programme.desc: Philadelphias seisavad poisid vastamisi siseinfot omava kahtlase pakkujaga ja endise NFL-i staari Vince Papaleiga võitluses vana jalgpallipassi ja koloniaalajastu musketi eest, mis võib olla vaart varandust... kui see on tõeline.

programme.title: Pandikunnid
programme.desc: Rick Harrison koos oma perega on Las Vegases asuva pandimaja omanikud. Sari "Pandikunnid" jalgib mida põnevat pandimajja tuuakse ning mida muuakse. Kaib pidev tingimine hindade ule ning aeg-ajalt satub pandimajja ka vaga vaartuslikke esemeid.

programme.title: Pandikunnid
programme.desc: Kui muuja tuleb Henri de Toulouse-Lautreci plakatiga, kas see avaldab Rickile muljet või utleb ta nagemist? Vahepeal võtab Chum valja mõned 1912. aasta Yalei pesapallivormid. Kas see on kodujooks või valjalook?

programme.title: Oak Islandi needus
programme.desc: Parast pikka ootamist saab vennaskond lõpuks loa naasta oma kaevetoode juurde soos. Peaaegu kohe teevad nad avastuse, mis võib uhendada kõik salaparases soos olevad munakividega paigad.

programme.title: Ajaloo suurimad saladused
programme.desc: See on uks kuulsamaid lugusid piiblist. Kas teaduslikud tõendid suudavad tõestada, et suur uleujutus leidis tõesti aset? Ja mis juhtus sellisel juhul Noa laevaga?

programme.title: Tules karastunud
programme.desc: Bill Morani sepakoolis pannakse kolm parimat seppa ulimale proovile. Parast kahte julma katsumust saab ainult uks neist võimaluse võistelda peaauhinna eest.

programme.title: Lahingud ladude parast
programme.desc: Arst on... Riversideis. Rene võtab suurelt ette. Ivy leiab asjadest pungil laoboksi ja komistab ebatavalise paritoluga antiikesemete peale. Darrell haarab vaiksema boksi, kuid avastab, et head asjad on mõnikord tõepoolest vaikestes pakendites.

programme.title: Lahingud ladude parast
programme.desc: Renel on Stantonis kasumit jahtides leiged tulemused. Dusty leiab hunniku kvaliteetset varustust, kinkides endale korraliku palgapaeva. Aardeid otsides saab Brandi siiski kaed roheliseks... lihtsalt mitte nii, nagu ta ootas.

programme.title: Iidsed tulnukad
programme.desc: Muistsed sumerid rajasid tsivilisatsiooni, mida peetakse maailma esimeseks, ja nad panid oma erakordsed saavutused oma jumalate, Anunnakide arvele. Kuid kas on võimalik, et need olendid olid maavalised kulalised Maal?

programme.title: Oak Islandi needus
programme.desc: Parast enam kui tosin aastat kestnud otsinguid on meeskond võib-olla avastanud legendaarse Chappelli võlvkambri.

programme.title: Muistsete tulnukate eriesitlus
programme.desc: Inimesed on alles kratsimas pinda teadmiste osas meie esivanematest. Kadunud linnad, iidsed tekstid, salaparased nikerdused ja seletamatud ehitised annavad vihjeid ammu unustatud ajastust, mis ulatub kaugemale ajalukku.

programme.title: William Shatneriga seletamatutes paikades
programme.desc: Kõikjal maailmas on kohti ja esemeid, mida peetakse neetuks. Kas needused on pelgalt liigse kujutlusvõime tulemus või on võimalik, et needused on reaalsed ja mangus on tumedad jõud, mis ei allu seletusele?

programme.title: Oksjonikutid
programme.desc: Ton ja Allen suunduvad Playa Vistale Californias ja teevad pakkumise selgelt vaartuslikule konteinerile. Ent varjust leitakse jõhker ja kiire Quadzilla ATV ning palgamõrvarite relvad - 1910. aastate Remington Derringer ja 1880. aastate Palm Squeezer.

programme.title: Oksjonikutid
programme.desc: Ton ja Allen suunduvad Torranceisse Californias, salajasse oksjonikuttide kullakaevandusse. Nad omandavad 19. sajandi alguse Edisoni grammofoni koos haruldaste vahasilindritega ning uhekohalise Addictor 190 minipaadi, mis loodud kiireks lõbusõiduks.

programme.title: Pandikunnid
programme.desc: Rick Harrison koos oma perega on Las Vegases asuva pandimaja omanikud. Sari "Pandikunnid" jalgib mida põnevat pandimajja tuuakse ning mida muuakse. Kaib pidev tingimine hindade ule ning aeg-ajalt satub pandimajja ka vaga vaartuslikke esemeid.

programme.title: Oksjonikutid
programme.desc: Ton ja Allen leiavad võidetud laokonteineritest 1980ndate Ms. Pac-Mani videomanguautomaadi ning haruldase Air Jordani retrokogu. Harley V-twin EVO mootor ja uuenduslik 1958. a topeltvedrustusega õõtshoob-raam võivad meeste rahakotid kahku tuhjendada.

programme.title: Food Tech
programme.desc: Host Bobby Bognar explores Americas buffets, starting in Las Vegas. He learns shrimp-catching secrets in Florida, horseradish spice in Wisconsin, honey-making in California and sugar cane processing in Hawaii.

programme.title: UFO Hunters
programme.desc: American docuseries following William J. Birnes and his team of "ufologists" as they search for evidence of extra-terrestrial life. Each episode looks into new reported UFO sightings, with some cases involving guests who allege to have been contacted or even abducted by aliens. Listen to witness accounts of shocking close encounters, and join the team as they analyse photographic and video evidence in search of the truth. As they look into some of the most notorious alien hot-spots in the US, theyll investigate whether space is really as empty as we think.

programme.title: Chasing Mummies
programme.desc: Discovering the final resting place of Cleopatra is a lifelong passion for many an archaeologist. Now Zahi has permitted some to dive into the Mediterranean Sea and bring up a nine-ton pylon that is a confirmed part of her shrine.

programme.title: Jumalate kokkupõrge
programme.desc: Homerose "Odusseia" on kuulsaim eepos labi aegade. Ent kas see võib põhineda tõeliselt juhtunul? Astronoomilised vihjed ja varsked geoloogilised andmed pakuvad nuud tõendeid, mis on Odysseuse looga otseselt seotud.

programme.title: Search for the Lost Giants
programme.desc: Search for the Lost Giants follows two brothers on their quest to find lost giants. According to the Bible there were ancient giants wandering along the Earth. A few years ago some Freemasons found stone structures and corridors underground that indicated a lost civilization. The brothers Bill and Jim Viera are looking for evidence of missing bones from ancient skeletons that are suspected to have clocked in at over seven feet tall.

programme.title: Iidne võimatu
programme.desc: Iidsed inimesed viisid vaeosad ule 1200 meetrit laia jõe, kaevandasid naftat ilma moodsate puurkaevudeta ja ehitasid veereservuaari, mis mahutas 85 000 kuupmeetrit vett.

programme.title: Serial Killer Earth
programme.desc: Gripping and unsettling documentary series that features a team of experts who in each episode examine various footage from news and home video, as well as eyewitness testimony, in order to explain, understand and inform viewers of what actually happened during some of the most devastating natural disasters- including Hurricane Katrina, the earthquake and tsunami that devastated Japan, a monstrous earthquake in Haiti, avalanche of rocks and debris that destroyed a village in Honduras, and many other hurricanes, earthquakes, tsunamis, floodings, droughts and devastating forest fires. They will also investigate how these recent disasters compare and contrast with the most historic natural disasters of the past.

programme.title: Life After People
programme.desc: This unique documentary series explores what the planet would look like if all human life diappeared. With comment and opinion coming from scientists, engineers and other experts, this show speculates on how a lack of human intervention would impact on the environment and the other animal species. The show does not provide any explanation as to why humans have vanished from the face of the Earth but does surmise that human infrastructure is still present along with pets and domesticated livestock. Each episode explores what would happen to specific structures such as skyscrapers, bridges and dams or details the impact on human remains, artefacts and other objects. Some real-life abandoned locations are discussed and the show also uses CGI dramatisations to depict how the situation would look after one day, one week, one year, 10 years, 15 years, 25 years, 50 years, 100 years, 200 years, etc.

programme.title: Food Tech
programme.desc: Host Bobby Bognar explores Americas buffets, starting in Las Vegas. He learns shrimp-catching secrets in Florida, horseradish spice in Wisconsin, honey-making in California and sugar cane processing in Hawaii.

programme.title: Food Tech
programme.desc: Host Bobby Bognar explores Americas buffets, starting in Las Vegas. He learns shrimp-catching secrets in Florida, horseradish spice in Wisconsin, honey-making in California and sugar cane processing in Hawaii.

programme.title: How the Earth was made
programme.desc: With the help of expert geologists and various scientists, How the Earth Was Made is a remarkable documentary series that examines the powerful forces and events that have shaped our planet. Using stunning, computer generated cinematography, viewers are transported back billions of years to learn how our planet was formed, and the drastically different changes it has witnessed. Each episode focusses on a different location to explore how it has adapted and adjusted over millions of years, such as the Grand Canyon, Mount Everest, the Sahara desert and the Mariana Trench.

programme.title: Muistse aja top 10
programme.desc: Maailma kõige suuremad monumendid ei demonstreeri vaid jõukust, vaid ka võimu. Milline arheoloogiline paik on kõige jahmatavam, Stonehenge või Karnaki tempel?

programme.title: The Universe
programme.sub-title: Ancient Mysteries Solved: Star of Bethlehem
programme.desc: Every day, new information is discovered that helps us better understand how our Universe works. Some of this evidence solves mysteries dating back thousands of years. Some evidence offers new theories on how human civilization came into existence. In this season of The Universe: Ancient Mysteries Solved, well tackle mysteries such as an American Stonehenge built 500 years before Columbus, and how the Aztec Pyramids helped seal the downfall of the Mayan and Aztec empires. Well also look at some of the Roman Empires most iconic structures, and their connection to archeo-astronomy.

programme.title: UFO Hunters
programme.desc: American docuseries following William J. Birnes and his team of "ufologists" as they search for evidence of extra-terrestrial life. Each episode looks into new reported UFO sightings, with some cases involving guests who allege to have been contacted or even abducted by aliens. Listen to witness accounts of shocking close encounters, and join the team as they analyse photographic and video evidence in search of the truth. As they look into some of the most notorious alien hot-spots in the US, theyll investigate whether space is really as empty as we think.

programme.title: Iidsed tulnukad
programme.desc: ANCIENT ALIENS examines 75 million years of the most credible alien evidence here on Earth, from the age of the dinosaurs, to ancient Egypt, to the skies over the western desert in the present day US. Ancient cave drawings of strange creatures, an asphalt-like substance in an Egyptian pyramid made from the remains of unidentified creatures, continued mass sightings in the USA -- these are just a few of the strange stories that will be investigated.

programme.title: How the Earth was made

programme.desc: An ancient civilisation revered by scientists for their extremely accurate calendars, the Maya are also known for their mysterious ability to predict unsettling events.

programme.title: Muistse aja top 10
programme.desc: Maailma kõige suuremad monumendid ei demonstreeri vaid jõukust, vaid ka võimu. Milline arheoloogiline paik on kõige jahmatavam, Stonehenge või Karnaki tempel?

programme.title: The Universe
programme.sub-title: Ancient Mysteries Solved: Star of Bethlehem
programme.desc: Every day, new information is discovered that helps us better understand how our Universe works. Some of this evidence solves mysteries dating back thousands of years. Some evidence offers new theories on how human civilization came into existence. In this season of The Universe: Ancient Mysteries Solved, well tackle mysteries such as an American Stonehenge built 500 years before Columbus, and how the Aztec Pyramids helped seal the downfall of the Mayan and Aztec empires. Well also look at some of the Roman Empires most iconic structures, and their connection to archeo-astronomy.

programme.title: UFO Hunters
programme.desc: American docuseries following William J. Birnes and his team of "ufologists" as they search for evidence of extra-terrestrial life. Each episode looks into new reported UFO sightings, with some cases involving guests who allege to have been contacted or even abducted by aliens. Listen to witness accounts of shocking close encounters, and join the team as they analyse photographic and video evidence in search of the truth. As they look into some of the most notorious alien hot-spots in the US, theyll investigate whether space is really as empty as we think.

programme.title: Iidsed tulnukad
programme.desc: ANCIENT ALIENS examines 75 million years of the most credible alien evidence here on Earth, from the age of the dinosaurs, to ancient Egypt, to the skies over the western desert in the present day US. Ancient cave drawings of strange creatures, an asphalt-like substance in an Egyptian pyramid made from the remains of unidentified creatures, continued mass sightings in the USA -- these are just a few of the strange stories that will be investigated.

programme.title: How the Earth was made
programme.desc: With the help of expert geologists and various scientists, How the Earth Was Made is a remarkable documentary series that examines the powerful forces and events that have shaped our planet. Using stunning, computer generated cinematography, viewers are transported back billions of years to learn how our planet was formed, and the drastically different changes it has witnessed. Each episode focusses on a different location to explore how it has adapted and adjusted over millions of years, such as the Grand Canyon, Mount Everest, the Sahara desert and the Mariana Trench.

programme.title: Doomsday
programme.desc: Maale kukkunud asteroid põhjustas 65 miljonit aastat tagasi dinosauruste valjasuremise. Mis siis saaks, kui sarnane kosmosekamakas kukuks taas samasse kohta? Kuidas inimkond sellele jargnevad looduskatastroofid ule elaks?

programme.title: Paul McCartney _ A MusiCaresTribute
programme.desc: On February 10, 2012, Sir Paul McCartney was honored as the 2012 MusiCares® Person of the Year. At a gala event in Los Angeles, Paul and a cast of superstar guests performed some of the quintessential songs from his renowned and celebrated career. Proceeds from the sale of this product will provide essential support for MusiCares, which ensures that music people have a place to turn in times of financial, medical and personal need.

programme.title: Music Icons
programme.desc: During the recording of Dire Straits third album, Making Movies, David Knopfler suddenly left the band, bringing a permanent end to the brothers partnership within the group. As the 80s began, the band made use of the rise of music television to promote making movies and their subsequent output. Dire Straits finally dissolved in 1995, after Mark decided he wanted to focus on his solo career with no plans to re-form the band. Featuring archive material, music videos "Brothers in Arms" "Calling Elvis" and, exclusive insights from music critics and journalists Michael Bonner (Uncut Magazine), Hamish MacBain (Shortlist), John Aizlewood (Evening Standard). Rock Legends Dire Straits tells the story of one of Britains enduring rock bands.

programme.title: Guns N Roses - Live From the O2 Arena London
programme.desc: Watch this mega-production of Guns N Roses performing live at the O2 Arena to its fans singing and vibrating to each song. Includes; Paradise City, Sweet Child O Mine, November Rain and many more.

programme.title: AC/DC - Hells Highway
programme.desc: Awesome great live performance from AC/DC.

programme.title: iConcerts Hits
programme.desc: A selection of our best concert previews and exclusive interviews.

programme.title: The Police - Around the World
programme.desc: Around The World follows The Police on their first world tour in 1979 and 1980, as they visit 6 continents building their fanbase show-by-show, country-by-country, song-by-song. In between the performances, the film offers a jovial glimpse of the band as they travel around the world and their visits to local sights. Around The World is presented with restored picture and remastered audio, and includes complete performances of 4 songs featured in the documentary.

programme.title: Ziggy Marley - Live at the Filmore
programme.desc: The Fillmore Auditorium is a historic concert hall in San Francisco, California. Founded by Bill Graham, it was named after being located originally on the corners of Fillmore Street and Geary Boulevard.

programme.title: iConcerts Hits
programme.desc: A selection of our best concert previews and exclusive interviews.

programme.title: a-ha - Unplugged
programme.desc: The first a-ha MTV Unplugged Concert ever. The album "MTV Unplugged – Summer Solstice" is being released including a very special LIVE experience.Share the impressive unplugged concert with a-ha in front of astonishing scenery on the picturesque island of Giske, located on the Norwegian coastline.Experience the concert including some hit singles like "Take On Me", "The Sun Always Shines On TV", and "The Living Daylights" as well as two new Songs.

programme.title: Alice in Chains _ Unplugged
programme.desc: In their first live concert in over 2 years (and possibly their last concert ever), Alternative/metal group Alice in Chains performs acoustically at MTV Unplugged. Includes acoustic versions of the hit songs ""Got Me Wrong,"" ""Rooster,"" ""Would?,"" and ""Down in a Hole.

programme.title: The Black Keys - Live at Main Festival Square
programme.desc: Main Square Festival is a music festival that takes place in Arras, France, lasting three days.

programme.title: Interpol - Rock En Seine
programme.desc: Interpol is an American rock band from Manhattan, New York,[2] formed in 1997. Their original line-up consisted of Paul Banks, Daniel Kessler, Carlos Dengler and Greg Drudy.

programme.title: Music Icons
programme.desc: Neil Tennant and Chris Lowe met in a record store in West London. Although they came from different backgrounds they bonded over a love of electronic music. "Hague" their debut album "Please" was released in 1986, it entered the top 10 around the world. In 2013 the band released "Electric", which after the mellow Elysium saw them return to their dance roots, 30 years into their career the Pet Shop Boys remain top of the charts. Featuring archive material, music videos "Vocal", "Love etc".and, exclusive insights from music critics and journalists Michael Bonner (Uncut Magazine), Hamish MacBain (Shortlist), John Aizlewood (Evening Standard)

programme.title: The Police - Around the World
programme.desc: Around The World follows The Police on their first world tour in 1979 and 1980, as they visit 6 continents building their fanbase show-by-show, country-by-country, song-by-song. In between the performances, the film offers a jovial glimpse of the band as they travel around the world and their visits to local sights. Around The World is presented with restored picture and remastered audio, and includes complete performances of 4 songs featured in the documentary.

programme.title: Ziggy Marley - Live at the Filmore
programme.desc: The Fillmore Auditorium is a historic concert hall in San Francisco, California. Founded by Bill Graham, it was named after being located originally on the corners of Fillmore Street and Geary Boulevard.

programme.title: iConcerts Hits
programme.desc: A selection of our best concert previews and exclusive interviews.

programme.title: Metallica - Master of Puppets
programme.desc: Master of Puppets is the third studio album released by American thrash metal / heavy metal band Metallica, released March 3, 1986

programme.title: Celine Dion - Thats Just the Woman In Me
programme.desc: Thats Just the Woman in Me is an American television special by Canadian singer Celine Dion which was aired on CBS on February 15, 2008 and was recorded at the Wiltern Theater in Los Angeles, California

programme.title: Rock am Ring
programme.desc: Rock im Park is a music festival that takes place in Nuremberg, Germany, lasting three days. Featuring : The 1975.

programme.title: Linkin Park - Road To Revolution
programme.desc: Recorded live at the Milton Keynes stadium in England, Road to Revolution brings the 2 Grammy winning rock band Linkin Park in an explosive performance to over 55,000 fans, the biggest audience in the 6-year Revolution Project tour. To the audiences delight, the set list includes mega-hits like "Crawling", "In The End", "One Step Closer" and "What Ive Done".

programme.title: Radiohead - The King of Limbs
programme.sub-title: Radiohead - The King of Limbs: Live from the Basement
programme.desc: The King of Limbs: Live from the Basement is a 2011 live video album by the English alternative rock band Radiohead, performing their eighth album, The King of Limbs (2011).

programme.title: Childish Gambino - Live at Rockwood Music Hall
programme.desc: Its been a crazy year for Donald Glover, but nothing has been more blazing than his career as rapper Childish Gambino. The project, born of a Wu-Tang name generator, is full of witty, rambunctious energy, as he effortlessly demonstrates in his session at Rockwood Music Hall. Along with collaborator and musical guru Ludwig Gransson on electric guitar, Gambino rips through tracks from his wildly popular EP as well as the lead single from his debut album Camp (out now on Glassnote Records). From introspection to love to pop culture and punny metaphors, Gambino runs an impressive lyrical gammit, one that inspires all the vital decision making organs.

programme.title: iConcerts Hits
programme.desc: A selection of our best concert previews and exclusive interviews.

programme.title: James Taylor (JTQ) _ Austin City Limits
programme.desc: The Austin City Limits Music Festival is an annual music festival that takes place at Zilker Park in Austin, Texas. The festival features more than 130 bands on eight stages for three days.

programme.title: Bob Dylan
programme.desc: Bob Dylan was an inspiration to hordes of imitators and millions of fans; but until now there has never been an authoritative independent review of the factors that shaped his early years. Drawing on rare footage of Dylan in performance this powerful and penetrating film features the impartial and forthright views of a leading team of critics and working musicians.

programme.title: Thin Lizzy - Live and Dangerous
programme.desc: All of the essential tracks from an amazing band were unleashed in a blistering razor sharp celebration of hard rock that has been rightly hailed as a rock masterpiece. This is the independent critical review of a masterpiece. Featuring rare archive interviews with Phil Lynott, Eric Bell, Philomena Lynott and stunning performances of the classic material.

programme.title: Pet Shop Boys
programme.sub-title: Pet Shop Boys: Live at Roskilde 2009
programme.desc: Filmed in Roskilde, Denmark, this concert film will give all fans a spectacular Live experience from start to finish. Classic Pet Shop Boys featuring unforgettable version of their hits: Always On My Wind, West End Girls, "Being Boring" and many more...

programme.title: AC/DC - Live in Madrid
programme.desc: No Bull documents the classic 1996 Ballbreaker tour, recorded at the Plaza De Toros De Las Ventas (Madrid, Spain). The show, involving a crane, a large model of ""Rosie"" and a finale with half a dozen blazing cannons, features 20 live tracks spanning their then 23-year career. It features 4 tracks from Ballbreaker album, as well as other classic songs by the band.

programme.title: iConcerts Hits
programme.desc: A selection of our best concert previews and exclusive interviews.

programme.title: James Taylor (JTQ) _ Austin City Limits
programme.desc: The Austin City Limits Music Festival is an annual music festival that takes place at Zilker Park in Austin, Texas. The festival features more than 130 bands on eight stages for three days.

programme.title: Bob Dylan

programme.title: iConcerts Hits
programme.desc: A selection of our best concert previews and exclusive interviews.

programme.title: Elvis Costello _ Detour Live At Liverpool Philharmonic Hall
programme.desc: The truly spectacular Detour show from musical legend Elvis Costello was filmed on 15th June 2015 at the Liverpool Philharmonic Hall. This acoustic set with tracks pared right back to the bone allows his voice and the power and emotion of his lyrics to step right to the foreground. The Detour tour allowed Costello to use a Storytellers style to talk about family, life and his career along with the stories behind such songs as " Watching the Detectives ", " Alison ", " A Good Year For the Roses "... The Detour tour was a solo effort with Costello playing guitar and piano. Joining Costello on a few tracks are Rebecca and Meghan Lovell of Larkin Poe.

programme.title: WALK the MOON - Live in London
programme.desc: Filmed at Roundhouse, London, this concert film will give all fans a spectacular Live experience from start to finish. Walk the Moon performs their hits including "Shiver Shiver", "Next in Line", "Anna Sun" and many more.

programme.title: Panic! At the Disco - Rock Am Ring
programme.desc: Rock im Park is a music festival that takes place in Nuremberg, Germany, lasting three days. Featuring : Panic! At the Disco

programme.title: BLACKPINK - The Show
programme.desc: The Show opened with "Kill This Love", following a video featuring sights of dark and empty cities around the world.[9] Apart from live performances it also included several pre-recorded tracks.[10] Each member performed their own solo stage; Jennie performed her song "Solo" with new rap lyrics written by her, and Rose shared a preview of her solo debut "Gone", while Jisoo and Lisa performed covers of Tove Los "Habits (Stay High)" and Doja Cats "Say So " respectively, both adding new self-written lyrics .

programme.title: Wolf Alice - Reading and Leeds Festival
programme.desc: The Reading and Leeds Festivals are a pair of music festivals that take place annually in the cities of Reading and Leeds in England. Featuring Wolf Alice.

programme.title: Foals - A Session With Foals
programme.desc: Being from the rain-ridden lands of England, Foals are used to a different kind of festival environment: generally speaking, frontman Yannis Philippakis described them as "mud and wellies" ordeals. So were sure they were quite pleased to travel halfway around the world to the California desert to perform for Coachellas music-hungry crowds. Prior to taking to the stage in Indio, however, Foals made a pit stop at our little poolside bungalow to perform a Festival Fever Session featuring songs off their highly-acclaimed, recent full-length Holy Fire. While you might have already seen the bands in-the-flesh transformation of "My Number" into a slow-burning beaut, weve expanded the session to include the subtle closer "Moon".

programme.title: iConcerts Hits
programme.desc: A selection of our best concert previews and exclusive interviews.

programme.title: James Taylor (JTQ) _ Austin City Limits
programme.desc: The Austin City Limits Music Festival is an annual music festival that takes place at Zilker Park in Austin, Texas. The festival features more than 130 bands on eight stages for three days.

programme.title: Bob Dylan
programme.desc: Bob Dylan was an inspiration to hordes of imitators and millions of fans; but until now there has never been an authoritative independent review of the factors that shaped his early years. Drawing on rare footage of Dylan in performance this powerful and penetrating film features the impartial and forthright views of a leading team of critics and working musicians.

programme.title: Thin Lizzy - Live and Dangerous
programme.desc: All of the essential tracks from an amazing band were unleashed in a blistering razor sharp celebration of hard rock that has been rightly hailed as a rock masterpiece. This is the independent critical review of a masterpiece. Featuring rare archive interviews with Phil Lynott, Eric Bell, Philomena Lynott and stunning performances of the classic material.

programme.title: iConcerts Hits
programme.desc: A selection of our best concert previews and exclusive interviews.

programme.title: Kiss - Live in Nurburgring
programme.desc: Kiss is one of the legendary groups in Hard Rock history. They have millions of fans around the world and over 100 million records sold. KISS confirms why they have been the best on the scene for nearly four decades, in a performance that made history, impressing an audience of more than 85,000 people, in a show of more than 2 hours and packed with hits, held at the Nurburgring, Germany in 2010.

programme.title: Enrique Iglesias _ Live from Odyssey Arena
programme.desc: Filmed at Odyssey Arena, Belfast, this concert film will give all fans a spectacular Live experience from start to finish. Classic Enrique Iglesias featuring unforgettable version of his hits: ""Bailamos"", ""Hero"", ""Be With You"" and many more….

programme.title: Led Zeppelin _ Physical Graffiti
programme.sub-title: Led Zeppelin _ Physical Graffiti: Album Under Review
programme.desc: This is a documentary film about the build-up, making, release, and - crucially - music contained on this most revered of albums. With the aid of rare and classic performances, scarce interviews, seldom seen photographs and contributions from those involved in the making of the record - plus the review and critique from a panel of Zeppelin experts - this program finally lifts the lid on what many believe to be Led Zeps very finest offering. With contributions from; the albums engineer, Ron Nevison; former Yardbird, Chris Dreja; Swansong recording artist, Maggie Bell; author of The Rough Guide to Led Zeppelin, Nigel Williamson; Tight But Loose editor, Dave Lewis; Classic Rock Magazines Malcolm Dome; renowned guitar tutor and author, Rikky Rooksby and Robert Plant biographer, Neil Daniels. This is the complete story behind what what Rolling Stone called "their Tommy, Beggars Banquet and Sgt. Pepper rolled into one".

programme.title: Maroon 5 _ Live in London
programme.desc: Filmed at Roundhouse, London, this concert film will give all fans a spectacular Live experience from start to finish. Classic Maroon 5 featuring unforgettable version of their hits: Moves Like Jagger, Daylight, "This Love" and many more…

programme.title: Music Icons
programme.desc: Birmingham in the late 1960s was an industrial city, packed with music groups. At its height, the New Musical Express had reported 500 on its bustling circuit and from two of these groups, Black Sabbath was formed. The Beatles would be a key influence for Ozzy, but bassist Geezer Butler also shaped Ozzys work, through his lyrics After signing to Vertigo Records in 1970, the four piece used their distinctive sound to full effect for their self-titled debut album, Black Sabbath. Black Sabbath became a commercial success, entering the UK top 10 and the US charts. In its first year it sold one million copies. Keen to build on the success, the band entered the studio just four months after releasing their debut. The title track, Paranoid, would lead the new album. Featuring archive material, music videos "PARANOID" "EVIL WOMAN" and, exclusive insights from music critics and journalists JOHN AIZLEWOOD (Evening Standard), DANIELLE PERRY (XFM), WILL HODGKINSON (The Times) and CAMILLA PIA (BBC Radio 6)

programme.title: Paul McCartney _ A MusiCaresTribute
programme.desc: On February 10, 2012, Sir Paul McCartney was honored as the 2012 MusiCares® Person of the Year. At a gala event in Los Angeles, Paul and a cast of superstar guests performed some of the quintessential songs from his renowned and celebrated career. Proceeds from the sale of this product will provide essential support for MusiCares, which ensures that music people have a place to turn in times of financial, medical and personal need.

programme.title: Oasis - Music In Review
programme.desc: This film features a wealth of rare archive film of Oasis on stage and in performance, plus in-depth interviews with a leading team of music critics and contemporaries. This penetrating critical analysis draws on archive footage of the Gallagher brothers, showcasing the energy and attitude that brought a flagging British music scene back to life.

programme.title: The Offspring - Rock AM
programme.desc: The Offspring is an American rock band from Garden Grove, California, formed in 1984. Originally formed under the name Manic Subsidal, the bands lineup consists of lead vocalist and rhythm guitarist Bryan "Dexter" Holland, bassist Todd Morse and lead guitarist Kevin "Noodles" Wasserman.

programme.title: Velvet Revolver - Live in Houston
programme.desc: This concert by Velvet Revolver was filmed in Houston, Texas in 2005 during the tour in support of their bestselling and Grammy Award winning debut album "Contraband". The full length live tracks are intercut with snippets of interview with the various band members talking about how Velvet Revolver came into being. The set list naturally focuses on that debut release but is complimented by two tracks from the Guns n Roses catalog and two tracks from Stone Temple Pilots debut album highlighting the history of the band members. Velvet Revolver are an outstanding live band and are on great form in front of a typically enthusiastic Texan crowd.

programme.title: Metallica - Master of Puppets
programme.desc: Master of Puppets is the third studio album released by American thrash metal / heavy metal band Metallica, released March 3, 1986

programme.title: Adele _ iTunes Festival
programme.sub-title: Adele _ iTunes Festival: Live in London
programme.desc: Fans at the iTunes Festival: London 2011 were blown away with the performance of English singer-songwriter Adele. This concert was recorded live on stage at The Roundhouse in London, United Kingdom, where Adele gave one of the best shows of her career with her unique voice.

programme.title: Fatal Affairs
programme.desc: When a woman meets a marine, they fall in love and start a life together. This perfect façade hides a dirty double life of drugs and deceit.

programme.title: Do Not Disturb
programme.desc: Documentary series examining the sinister secrets of five-star accommodations across the world. These treacherous tales range from salacious acts to heartless murders, all behind the doors of some of the worlds most prestigious hotels. With dramatic re-enactments and testimonies from law enforcement officials, staff, and victims loved ones, the series regales some of the most horrific crimes committed in top hotels.

programme.title: The Curious Case of...
programme.desc: Host Beth Karas takes a deep dive into real-life scandals, exposing bizarre secrets, shattered lives and twisted motives, as each story uncovers deceit, greed and manipulation, proving that truth is far more chilling than fiction.

programme.title: Signs of a Psychopath
programme.desc: Series about the most notorious killers in modern history. An analysis of news images and statements made by the killers themselves shows how they worked. Explore the evil signs that every psychopath has got and follow the real archive footage.

programme.title: Dead of Night
programme.desc: Investigations of real-life murders which occurred during nighttime in different towns across America. Night is the part of the day when its easiest for dangerous killers to catch their victims. Individuals who find themselves alone in the dark become targets of horrible predators who are looking for an opportunity to kill. In the morning their loved ones are looking for them desperately.

programme.title: Kurjus elab siin
programme.desc: Based on real life events. Evil Lives Here is a true crime story show that speaks to family members of well-known murderers and criminals. It includes re-enactments, police footage, family photographs and videos that gives you the view through the murderers eyes. The programme is also styled to make you imagine it in the eyes of a loved one that you know. It is an in-depth investigation into the criminals life and the life of the family after the crime. It also looks into possible reasons why the criminal committed the crime without placing a viewpoint.

programme.title: Kurjus elab siin
programme.sub-title: He Was A Good Man To Me

programme.title: Kellega ma kull abiellusin?
programme.desc: Shocking revelations ensue in this deceptive documentary series, where marital relationships built on lies are examined, revealing cases of betrayal, bemusement, and sheer audacity. Featuring dramatised reconstructions and interviews with the spouses involved, each episode tells a story about a particular relationship that has fallen apart after an outrageous discovery. These husbands and wives thought they were marrying their soulmates, but after noticing something peculiar about their better half, they decided to investigate further, revealing cases of double-lives, criminal activity, even sinister killings.

programme.title: Kellega ma kull abiellusin?

programme.title: Betrayed
programme.desc: A true crime show with a twist - the chiling stories are told from the fictionalised first-person pespective of the victim. The stories reveal that victims are often normal, average Americans with everyday dreams and concerns about money, their relationshiips, their jobs, their family, etc. who fall prey to the betrayal of friends, colleagues, family members or lovers. The motives vary in each epsiode, from jealousies concerning an extramarital affair to robbery, personal vendettas and secret ambitions. The show uses dramatised recreations of the events to bring the viewer closer to the people involved and also includes interviews with the victims family and the detectives who investigated the crime.

programme.title: Betrayed

The show uses dramatised recreations of the events to bring the viewer closer to the people involved and also includes interviews with the victims family and the detectives who investigated the crime.

programme.title: Tõelised kuriteod Aphrodite Jonesiga
programme.desc: Crime documentary series hosted by Aphrodite Jones who looks into real-life crimes including some of the most atrocious murders of recent times. Jones shares details of these gruesome crimes alongside authentic footage, evidence and interviews with people associated to the case – sometimes even the perpetrator themselves. Subjects featured in the series include such high-profile cases as O. J. Simpson, Michael Jackson, the notorious Zodiac serial killer and the music producer Phil Spector. Jones attempts to get inside the minds of her subjects to better understand their motives for committing such unspeakable crimes. Aphrodite Jones is a true-crime expert, a former crime reporter for FOX News and the author of eight books.

programme.title: Tõelised kuriteod Aphrodite Jonesiga

programme.title: Justice USA
programme.desc: Diamond begins her 25-year sentence. Katie goes before the parole board. A new arrestee suffers from heroin withdrawal.

programme.title: The Killer Closer
programme.desc: Lindy Gligorijevic was known as The Killer Closer for her formidable work in the LAPDs Foothill Homicide Unit during the 1990s. This true-crime documentary series examines some of her most challenging investigations, and with dramatic reconstructions and interviews with a number of law enforcement officials including Lindy herself, the series demonstrates the dedication of the fierce detective as she sought justice for victims. Revisit some of her most shocking cases as we dive into the past to reveal a spate of chilling crimes in this six-part series.

programme.title: The Lies That Bind
programme.desc: A true-crime series that exposes the sinister secrets and dark betrayals that are often involved in heinous crimes of murder. Sometimes the secret or lie can appear innocent at first but they are soon revealed to have life-altering consequences. Or the indiscretion or flasehood can be deliberately misleading in order to protect the guilty. Investigators have to determine which witness accounts are true and which are false or deceitful. Episodes include stories such as when Louisiana Melton and her boyfriend Phillip Brown are found shot dead and the investigating officer uncovers a huge lie that sheds light on the crime; or when Lisa Moore goes missing shortly after ending her marriage and her family fear the worst; or when a pastors wife is killed when the parsonage is burned down and the fire marshall uncovers a damaging secret.

programme.title: The Price of Glee
programme.desc: Cast and crew recount the rise of Glee and reveal how sudden stardom and the unrelenting pressure of making a hit show can have tragic consequences.

programme.title: The Price of Glee
programme.desc: With chilling tales about the dark side of fame and fortune, friends and researchers reveal Glee star Cory Monteiths final moments.

programme.title: Ameerika monstrum
programme.desc: Serial killers hiding in plain sight and murderers living perfect family life. American Monster reveals the truth behind some of the most shocking crimes thats happened around the country. Through dramatization and never-seen-before footage, each case shows you that anyone can be a monster, but it also allows us to understand how they became monsters. Through testimonies of family members and friends, along with home videos showing them at their most innocent, this true-crime drama gives us a closer look at the double life of some of the most ruthless monster in American history.

programme.title: Primal Instinct
programme.desc: In this true-crime documentary series we explore gruesome murders that have transpired after relationships, flings and affairs have turned sour. Using reenactments, each episode graphically details the motives behind the murders, revealing how the relationships spiralled out of control and left someone dead. We follow the story of a different murder in each episode, whether its jealous ex-lovers, paranoid husbands or resentful mistresses. These real life stories show the darker side of love and the deception it can lead to.

programme.title: Man with a Van
programme.desc: Meredith Emerson starts the new year by hiking on Georgias Blood Mountain with her dog. When she vanishes and her dog is found 60 miles away a frantic search begins.

programme.title: Last Night in...
programme.desc: 24-year-old Rob Phillips arrives in Nashville with his new wife Kelli. Theyve moved across the country to launch Robs country music career. But a late-night meeting turns deadly.

programme.title: Southern Gothic
programme.desc: This gritty documentary series takes a look at the dark underbelly of the American South. It deals with true crime stories from this unique part of the country with its decaying vegetation, sinister plantations, rusty farm implements and foreboding swamps. Episodes deal with cases such as when a womans body is discovered floating in a creek, her family secrets, age-old disputes and a suspicious funeral point to a complex conspiracy; when a college student is assaulted and burned in her dorm room; when three teenagers disappear and are found dead, sparking the states largest manhunt; when a loving mother is shot dead at a Memphis gas station; and when the local Baptist church is involved in the shooting of a young husband.

programme.title: Kadunud
programme.desc: Disappeared is an American documentary TV show that contains dramatic re-enactments and interviews with law enforcement officers, investigators, and relatives connected with cases in which individuals have gone missing without a trace. The stories are heartbreaking and unbelievable, the families of people who have gone missing never give up hope. Some cases have tragic endings, some are heartwarming, but most of them are still open which makes the agony of the families go on.

programme.title: Kurjus elab siin
programme.desc: Based on real life events. Evil Lives Here is a true crime story show that speaks to family members of well-known murderers and criminals. It includes re-enactments, police footage, family photographs and videos that gives you the view through the murderers eyes. The programme is also styled to make you imagine it in the eyes of a loved one that you know. It is an in-depth investigation into the criminals life and the life of the family after the crime. It also looks into possible reasons why the criminal committed the crime without placing a viewpoint.

programme.title: Kadunud
programme.desc: Disappeared is an American documentary TV show that contains dramatic re-enactments and interviews with law enforcement officers, investigators, and relatives connected with cases in which individuals have gone missing without a trace. The stories are heartbreaking and unbelievable, the families of people who have gone missing never give up hope. Some cases have tragic endings, some are heartwarming, but most of them are still open which makes the agony of the families go on.

programme.title: Lethally Blonde
programme.desc: In the 1970s, Anneka Di Lorenzo found fame as a successful model in Penthouse Magazine. However, from that point, her life unravelled with tragic consequences.

programme.title: Man with a Van
programme.desc: Meredith Emerson starts the new year by hiking on Georgias Blood Mountain with her dog. When she vanishes and her dog is found 60 miles away a frantic search begins.

programme.title: Last Night in...
programme.desc: 24-year-old Rob Phillips arrives in Nashville with his new wife Kelli. Theyve moved across the country to launch Robs country music career. But a late-night meeting turns deadly.

programme.title: Ben on tagasi
programme.desc: Draama. 19-aastane Ben on staažikas narkomaan, kes viibib võõrutusravil. Kui ta ootamatult jõululaupaeval koju ilmub, võtab ema poisi avasuli vastu, kuid muretseb siiski, kas poeg suudab kaineks jaada. Naine puuab teha omalt poolt kõik, et poeg uuesti halbade harjumuste kuusi ei kukuks. Ülimalt pingeline ja emotsionaalne olukord paneb ema ja poja suhted proovile, ent naitab ka seda, kui kaugele inimesed on oma lahedaste kaitsmiseks valmis minema. Kaasahaarava ja sudamliku filmi peaosades mangivad Julia Roberts ("Notting Hill") ja Lucas Hedges ("Kolm reklaamtahvlit linna servas").

programme.title: Suur Vallrahu
programme.desc: Suur Vallrahu on ainus paik maailmas, kus iidne vihmamets kohtub troopilise korallrahuga - sealjuures toetab rannikuala mitmesuguste ainulaadsete liikide elu.

programme.title: Maaratud ellujaaja
programme.desc: Kui president Kirkman avaldab oma ametiaja lahtestamise plaani, teeb Alex vastuolulise avaliku teadaande, mis ahvardab selle plaani roobastelt maha tõugata. Tõele lahemale jõudes satub FBI agent Hannah Wells teadmatult otse ohtliku lõksu keskele. Riik leinab endiselt asepresidendi kaotust.

programme.title: Tumeaine
programme.desc: Neli lahkub laevalt ning puuab endise elu juurde naasta, kuid vale inimese usaldamine viib varitsuseni kaugel, huljatud planeedil. Ülejaanud meeskond avastab viimaks Nelja hammastava mineviku ning tõttab Nelja leidma ja paastma, enne kui ta viiakse tagasi tema koduplaneedile, kus teda ootaks kindel surm endiste vaenlaste kuusis.

programme.title: Masterchef Soome
programme.desc: Võistlejad peavad oma roa komponendid ostma oksjonilt kokkamisaja eest. Kohtunikud Helena Puolakka, Henri Alen ja Kari Aihinen.

programme.title: Mees teab
programme.desc: Adamil ja Andil tekib tooalane vaidlus ning nad peavad nagema vaeva, et seda mitte kodusesse ellu ule kanda. Lapsed on avastanud, et Lowell on imeline kokk ning puuavad teda veenda kauemaks nendega jaama.

programme.title: Mees teab
programme.desc: Adam naeb pealt, kuidas Emmet lukatakse ning veenab Teddyt õe eest valja astuma. See aga ei meeldi Andile. Adam ja Don puuavad Joed veenda endale operatsioonijargseks taastumiseks medõde abiks palkama.

programme.title: Miss Fallaci
programme.desc: Oriana kohtab taas Alfredot ning armub temasse. Parast Frank Sinatra intervjueerimist lahkub ta USAst ja veenab oma toimetajat end Londonisse lahetama, et olla koos Alfredoga.

programme.title: CSI Kriminalistid
programme.desc: Kriminalistid saavad uurimiseks kolm uut surnukeha, kes on kõik seotud uhe petisega, kellel on mitu identiteeti.

programme.title: KRULLI Balearic - Vaiko Eplik and Eliit
programme.desc: See saab olema kahe legendaarse bandimaja esmakordne mõõduvõtt uhel kaunimal maiõhtul! Lexsoul Dancemachine ja Vaiko Eplik and Eliit mangivad oma taispika LIVE kontserdi ja lubadusi on sõlmitud ka uhislugudeks. Vaiko Eplik and Eliit ehk laulukirjutaja ja multiinstrumentalist, Eesti popmuusika kullastandard Vaiko Eplik ja supergrupp Eliit. Koosseis, kellega on ules kasvanud terve põlvkond muusikakuulajaid ja kellelt otsapidi inspiratsiooni saanud ka juba pealetulev generatsioon noori ja alles alustavaid loojaid.

programme.title: KRULLI Balearic - Lexsoul Dancemachine
programme.desc: See saab olema kahe legendaarse bandimaja esmakordne mõõduvõtt uhel kaunimal maiõhtul! Lexsoul Dancemachine ja Vaiko Eplik and Eliit mangivad oma taispika LIVE kontserdi ja lubadusi on sõlmitud ka uhislugudeks. Vaiko Eplik and Eliit ehk laulukirjutaja ja multiinstrumentalist, Eesti popmuusika kullastandard Vaiko Eplik ja supergrupp Eliit. Koosseis, kellega on ules kasvanud terve põlvkond muusikakuulajaid ja kellelt otsapidi inspiratsiooni saanud ka juba pealetulev generatsioon noori ja alles alustavaid loojaid.

programme.title: Rait, Raivo ja naised Iraanis
programme.desc: Raivo ja Rait jõuavad naistega Parsia lahe suurimale saarele Qeshm ja plaan on saarele ring peale teha. Et saar on paradiisiks ornitoloogidele, kaiakse Queshmil põnevaid linde otsimas. Samuti saab saarel mekkida kaamelipiima või kulastada soolakoobast. Õhtul tagasi mandrile jõudes võetakse uueks sihiks kuumaveeallikad, kuid seltskond satub hoopiski suurde lõbustusparki. Kuna muu maastik telkimist ei võimalda, tuleb eestlastel telgid pusti panna otse lõbustuspargi parklasse, kohalike noorte peo keskpunkti.

programme.title: Rait, Raivo ja naised Iraanis
programme.desc: Raivo ja Rait jõuavad naistega Parsia lahe suurimale saarele Qeshm ja plaan on saarele ring peale teha. Et saar on paradiisiks ornitoloogidele, kaiakse Queshmil põnevaid linde otsimas. Samuti saab saarel mekkida kaamelipiima või kulastada soolakoobast. Õhtul tagasi mandrile jõudes võetakse uueks sihiks kuumaveeallikad, kuid seltskond satub hoopiski suurde lõbustusparki. Kuna muu maastik telkimist ei võimalda, tuleb eestlastel telgid pusti panna otse lõbustuspargi parklasse, kohalike noorte peo keskpunkti.

programme.title: Maaratud ellujaaja
programme.desc: Oma esimese seaduse vastuvõtmise lootuses moodustab president Kirkman ebatõenaolise liidu; samal ajal teavitab FBI agent Hannah Wells agent Ritterit uuest murettekitavast ohust riigile.

programme.title: Tumeaine
programme.desc: Mikkei Sundikaadi komandor Delaney Truffault pakub meeskonnale imelist võimalust veidi uhikuid teenida ning vagagi vajalikku toetust hankida. Selleks peavad nad konkureerivalt korporatsioonilt mustilise seadeldise roovima. Olukorra muudab keerulisemaks teine halastamatute palgasõdurite ruhm, kes palgati sama too jaoks. Kaks meeskonda peavad uheskoos ulesande sooritama, kuid koostoo osutub vagagi keeruliseks…

programme.title: Masterchef Soome
programme.desc: Võistlejad peavad valmistama oma lemmik koolitoidu, mis on viidud MasterChefi tasemele. Kohtunikud Helena Puolakka, Kari Aihinen ja kulaliskohtunik Kim Mikkola.

programme.title: Mees teab
programme.desc: Adam ja kutid kulastavad Lowelli tema uues poissmehepesas ning hakkavad seal koduse elu eest põgenemiseks aega veetmas kaima. Andi puuab Adamit survestada, et endale lõpuks kontoris oma laud saada.

programme.title: Mees teab
programme.desc: Kate jaab Adamile oosel koju hiilimisega vahele ning mees otsustab kasutusele võtta vana kooli vanemlustaktikad. Andi on kurb, et tal on Emme beebiajast vahe pilte.

programme.title: Elon Muski show
programme.desc: Elon Musk naeb rasket vaeva autoturu revolutsioneerimise ja inimkonna Marsile toimetamise nimel. Ent oma planeetidevahelise missiooni realiseerimiseks tuleb tal esmalt elada ule globaalne majanduskriis.

programme.title: CSI Kriminalistid
programme.desc: Nick pakub end oma sunnipaeval vabatahtlikult uurima naruse motelli parklast leitud 16-aastase tudruku surma, sest ta on viimase aasta jooksul uurinud teisigi hotelliga seotud juhtumeid, mille kaigus sai tuttavaks ka selle tudrukuga.

programme.title: Kill Bill - Pruudi kattemaks vol. 1
programme.desc: Kassahitist põnevusmarul, mis on vurtsitatud uliefektsete võitlusstseenidega. Pruudi (Uma Thurman) ja ulejaanud pulmaliste verised kehad lamavad kabelipõrandal… Kuratlik Bill ning tema kõrilõikajad tegid aga saatusliku vea. Pruut ei surnud saadud haavadesse, vaid langes lihtsalt koomasse. Neli aastat hiljem teadvusele tulles asub naine tasumisretkele, et kriipsutada jargemooda maha kõik nimed oma "surmanimekirjast", kus viimasena seisab Billi nimi…

programme.title: Eiffel
programme.desc: 19nda sajandi lõpu Pariis. Parast monumentaalse Vabadussamba valmimist, oli Gustave Eiffel maailma kuulsamaid arhitekte. Eesseisva 1889. aasta Maailmanaituse tarvis, kaib Prantsuse valitsus Eiffelile peale, et ta valmistaks selle tarvis midagi võimsat ja suurejoonelist, kuid Eiffel ei taha sellest kuuldagi, vaid vaid tegeleda Pariisi metroo ehitamisega. Kuid kõik muutub kui valja ilmub Eiffeli noorpõlve armastus Adrianne, kelle armastus inspireerib Eiffelit looma maailma tuntuimat malestusmarki.

programme.title: Taht on sundinud
programme.desc: Kantrimuusikastaar Jackson Maine (Bradley Cooper) on parasjagu allakaigu aarel, kui ta avastab andeka tundmatu muusiku Ally (Lady Gaga). Jack juhib Ally rambivalgusesse ja paneb aluse tema tahelennule. Ally edukast karjaarist hoolimata varjutab nende suhet Jacki jatkuv võitlus oma sisemiste deemonitega...

programme.title: Mõrvad Lõuna-Prantsusmaal
programme.desc: Lõuna-Prantsusmaa paikesepaisteliste kungaste vahel uurivad peakohtunik Antoine Verlaque (Roger Allam) ja tema teravmeelne elukaaslane Marine Bonnet (Nancy Carroll) kauni Aixi linna sirava paikese all toimuvaid sungeid mõrvamusteeriume. Põhineb M.L Longworthi vaga armastatud raamatutel. Mõrv kohalikus ulikoolis sunnib Antoinei ja Marinei oma planeeritud nadalavahetuse reisi ara jatma.

programme.title: Taistunni intervjuu. Õnnelik Eesti
programme.desc: Nii Eestis kui kogu maailmas on kaimas arevad ja rahutud ajad. On tuhat põhjust olla tujust ara või koguni vihane. Kull aga on ka hulgaliselt põhjuseid olla iga vabas Eestis elatud paeva eest tanulik ja õnnelik. Vabariigi aastapaeva eel vestles ajakirjanik Raul Ranne tuntud ja armastatud kaasmaalastega, kes sisendavad rahu ja oskavad nautida argiseid hetki.

programme.title: Kodus ja võõrsil
programme.desc: Irene asub kaitsepositsioonile. Xander ja Dana ei leia uhist keelt. Bree ja Remi raagivad lõpuks tõtt.

programme.title: Reporter+
programme.desc: Uudistemagasinide lipulaev, mis toob olulisemad ja põnevamad uudised kodumaalt ja mujalt maailmast vaatajateni Reporterile omasel mahlakal moel. Saatejuhid on alati soliidsed Jaanus Koort, Simon Suviste ja Tõnis Sarap.

programme.title: Tahtsad ninad
programme.desc: Tele-esilinastus! 13-aastased Oliver ja Sass meisterdavad tooõpetuse tunnis ninakujulise prillihoidja, mis aratab ootamatult uhe salaparase suurinvestori huvi. Samal ajal naeb Oliveri hiljuti koondatud isa vaeva, et leida uus ametikoht. Poisid on iseseisvaks ariajamiseks aga liiga noored ning nii tekibki Oliveril plaan, kuidas kaks karbest uhe hoobiga tabada: nad palkavad oma firmat juhtima Oliveri isa ning paastavad seelabi ka vanemate karile sõitnud abielu! Konks on aga selles, et Oliveri isa ei tea, et tootab oma poja ja tolle sõbra Sassi heaks. Algab hoogne topeltmang, mis eskaleerub, kui poisid saavad teada, mis on salaparasel investoril tegelikult plaanis.

programme.title: Nutikas Eesti
programme.desc: Elurõõmsas malumangusaates seigeldakse ule Eesti erinevatel festivalidel ja laatadel, kulastatakse randu, hupatakse sisse mõnda kulapoodi ning otsitakse nutikaid inimesi, kellele esitada kuus põnevat malumangu kusimust, millele aravastamisel ootab inimesi auhind. Muhedad malumangud ja reportaažid suvisel Eestimaal. Saadet juhib Peeter Võsa ja telgitagustest toimetab auhinnatud saate "Õhtu!" meeskond.

programme.title: Vaba riigi vagevad
programme.desc: Eesti Vabariigi aastapaevale puhendatud suures erisaates kohtub saatejuht Roald Johannson inspireerivate ja vagevate kaasmaalastega, kes on end nullist ules tootanud ning tõestavad, et elus on tõepoolest kõik võimalik! Labi valu ja raskuste ideeni jõudmisest, eesmarkide poole puudlemisest ning Eesti jargmisest suurest sihist raagivad tippjuht Paavo Nõgene, modell Karmen Pedaru, jalgpallur Joel Lindpere, tippkokk Roman Zaštšerinski ja teised.

programme.title: Salmonid. 25 aastat hiljem
programme.desc: Kodumaise komoodia tele-esilinastus! Perekond Salmonid on Eestit valitsenud viimased veerand sajandit, nii kaudselt kui otseselt. Rikkusest on saanud jõukus ja saavutustest võim. Perepea Ella Salmon (Ita Ever) on olnud isegi president! Kuid sellestki jaab vaheks. Salmonid on otsustanud end suurte tahtedega ajalukku kirjutada, tuues Venemaa valduses oleva presidendi ametiraha tagasi Eestisse. Õilis, kuid omakasupuudlik plaan satub aga ootamatult ohtu ning Salmonitel tuleb leida lahendus, kuidas poorasest olukorrast võitjana valjuda. "Salmonid" oli Eesti esimene teleseriaal, mis aastatel 1993-1995 naitas humoorikalt, milline on eliidi ehk rikaste elu vaikeses Eestis. Veerand sajandiga on palju muutunud ja nii on aastal 2020 just õige aeg vaadata, mis on Salmonitest tanaseks saanud.

programme.title: Taistunni intervjuu. Õnnelik Eesti
programme.desc: Nii Eestis kui kogu maailmas on kaimas arevad ja rahutud ajad. On tuhat põhjust olla tujust ara või koguni vihane. Kull aga on ka hulgaliselt põhjuseid olla iga vabas Eestis elatud paeva eest tanulik ja õnnelik. Vabariigi aastapaeva eel vestles ajakirjanik Raul Ranne tuntud ja armastatud kaasmaalastega, kes sisendavad rahu ja oskavad nautida argiseid hetki.

programme.title: Öokulaline
programme.desc: Erakordne sissevaadet inimeste ellu pakkuv portreesaade "Öokulaline" koos saatejuht Mart Normetiga laheb taas kulla kuulsatele ja armastatud inimestele, et veeta nende juures kaks paeva ja uks oo. Eesti sajandi saja suurkuju hulka valitud Tõnu Kaljuste tahistas hiljuti oma 70. juubelit. Selle suure Eesti mehe sihikindlus on toonud talle labiloogi kogu maailmas. Aga alles 20 aastat tagasi vedas ta vagikaigast kohaliku omavalitsuse ja rahastajatega, et rajada inimtuhjale ja elektrivõrgust eraldatud Naissaarele oma ooperiteater. Tana on kontserdisaal pusti ning saarel asub ka Kaljuste teine kodu, kuhu Mart Normet lahebki ookulaliseks. Saate meeskond: Kullar Viimne, Andreas Lenk, Ave Lepik, Kairit Tsaro, Juhan Vihterpal.

programme.title: Heategevuskontsert Sumfoonia kangelastele
programme.desc: Ainulaadne heategevuskontsert viib kuulajad labi Eesti iseseisvumise ja kaitsetahte ajaloo. Kontsert on eriline nii oma ulesehituse kui ka sõnumi poolest. Esmakordselt Eestis jutustatakse labi muusika terviklik lugu rahva võitlusest vabaduse eest, uhendades maailma ja Eesti tuntuimad teosed uheks liigutavaks tervikuks. Iga lugu sumboliseerib Eesti ajaloo kindlat etappi. Kontserdi kogu tulu annetatakse Reservvaelaste Fondile, toetades reservvaelaste varustust ja koolitusi. Fond aitab kindlustada, et Eesti kaitsetahe ja vastupanuvõime pusivad ka tulevikus. Lavale astuvad ÜENSO sumfooniaorkester, segakoor Vox Populi, Alika, Metsatoll ja teised. Õhtut juhib Üllar Saaremae.

programme.title: Eesti matus
programme.desc: Kodumaine komoodia rullub lahti kui noor, kaubanduskeskustes pensionikindlustusi muuv Andres tutvub toopostil mustanahalise tudrukuga ja armub. Andrese uus armastatu - Lee, osutub aga vabameelseks maailmaranduriks, kellele eestlaste mammonaorjus ja tookultus arusaamatuks jaavad. Naiivsete unistuste tuules otsustavad noored minna laia ilma õnne otsima, ootamatult peab aga Andres minema oma vanaisa matustele ning pahaaimamatult võtab sinna ka Lee kaasa. Matustele on kokku sõitnud kirev seltskond sugulasi ja tuttavaid ning nagu eestlastele omane, kisub kurb sundmus õhtu arenedes vagisi koomiliseks. Õhku kerkivad eestlastele urgomased vaidlused võtavad sundmuste arenedes lausa huperboolseid mõõtmeid, tekitades arusaamatusi ka Andrese ja Lee suhetes. Osataitjad: Ago Anderson, Sandra Ashilevi, Markus Habakukk, Hilje Murel, Peeter Oja, Merle Palmiste, Jan Uuspõld, Anna Sergejeva, Tambet Tuisk.

programme.title: Vabariigi aastapaev. Estonia. Reporteri erisaade
programme.desc: Aastapaeva erisaade Estoniast, tõrvikurongkaigust, nii pidulauast kui ka nende juurest, kes tahtsa paeva auks tootavad. Glamuur ja fuusiline too astuvad sel õhtul kenasti koos.

programme.title: Soo
programme.desc: Teleesilinastus! Põnevusest pakatav armastusfilm viib meid 1917. aastasse. Euroopas mollab Esimene Maailmasõda ja Eesti idapiiri taga pulbitseb revolutsioon. Noor kunstnik Toomas Haava naaseb Pariisist venna sootallu. Tahtmatult massib ta end konflikti vagivaldse ja hirmsa Madjakuga, kes ahistab Metskassina tuntud kohalikku salaparast kaunitari Hildat. Loomult edev Toomas avastab end peatselt keset võitlust armastuse eest, kusjuures panuseks on ei rohkem ega vahem kui tema enda elu.

programme.title: Vigased pruudid
programme.desc: Eduard Vilde vigased pruudid arkavad taaskord ellu, tõestades uhelt poolt rahvakirjaniku annet kergeks meelelahutuseks, teisalt aga tuntud klassiku uue aja kuulutust, milles noorem põlvkond otsustavalt vanemale vastu hakkab ja ise oma eluõnne ule otsustada soovib.

programme.title: Oma rahvaga mul meeldib olla koos
programme.sub-title: Oma rahvaga mul meeldib olla koos: Toomas Lunge 60
programme.desc: Aasta esimesel õhtul naitab Kanal 2 Toomas Lunge 60. sunnipaeva kontsert-lavastust "Oma rahvaga mul meeldib olla koos". Eesti Rahva Muuseumis kõlab sudamlik kontsert-lavastus, mis teeb tagasivaate muusiku laval veedetud elule labi aastakumnete. Kõlavad juubilari autoripalad ja lemmiklood. Kokku saavad muusikalised koosseisud, mis pole juba aastaid kokku tulnud ja kuulda saab nii tuntud palasid kui lugusid, mis kirjutatud teatrilavastustele. Paljud tuttavad lood saavad sootuks uue seade ja kõla.

programme.title: Öokulaline
programme.desc: Hiljuti sai 70-aastaseks president Toomas Hendrik Ilves, kes sundis pagulaste peres Rootsis, kasvas ules Ameerika Ühendriikides ning tootas Eesti iseseisvuse nimel pikki aastaid Saksamaal, raadios Vaba Euroopa. Mart Normet laheb kaheks paevaks ja uheks ooks kulla eestlaste jaoks muutilisse paika, tema koju Mulgimaale - Ärma talusse. "Valisminister Ilvese initsiatiivil kuulume me tana Euroopa Liitu ja NATOsse ning tunneme end kaitstult. Suursaadik Ilvese ideest sai alguse Tiigrihupe ja seelabi meie idufirmade buum ning Eesti edulugu terves maailmas. Presidendina tõi ta fookusesse 20. augusti laiema tahistamise Eestis ning pani suure kirjandushuvilisena alguse uudissõnade konkursile," kirjeldab saatejuht Normet. "Ta on riigimees selle sõna kõige puhtamas tahenduses. Mistõttu on mul hea võimalus uurida talt ka tunnetust Eesti tuleviku kohta." Juubeli puhul toob ookulaline endaga kaasa ka suure ullatuse, mis toob presidendile lausa pisara silma.

programme.title: Apteeker Melchior
programme.desc: 2020. suve hakul algasid Eesti kõige suurejoonelisema filmitriloogia võtted, kus sattusid kokku esimene laastav koroonaviiruse laine, produktsioonilt ulikeerukas projekt ning aarmiselt tihe tootmisgraafik. Saade viib vaataja Apteeker Melchiori filmi telgitagustesse, toob valja põnevad intervjuud ning seninagemata kaadrid ainulaadsest filmitootmisest, mille kaigus valmis korraga mitte uks või kaks, vaid koguni kolm taispikka mangufilmi.

programme.title: Heategevuskontsert Sumfoonia kangelastele
programme.desc: Ainulaadne heategevuskontsert viib kuulajad labi Eesti iseseisvumise ja kaitsetahte ajaloo. Kontsert on eriline nii oma ulesehituse kui ka sõnumi poolest. Esmakordselt Eestis jutustatakse labi muusika terviklik lugu rahva võitlusest vabaduse eest, uhendades maailma ja Eesti tuntuimad teosed uheks liigutavaks tervikuks. Iga lugu sumboliseerib Eesti ajaloo kindlat etappi. Kontserdi kogu tulu annetatakse Reservvaelaste Fondile, toetades reservvaelaste varustust ja koolitusi. Fond aitab kindlustada, et Eesti kaitsetahe ja vastupanuvõime pusivad ka tulevikus. Lavale astuvad ÜENSO sumfooniaorkester, segakoor Vox Populi, Alika, Metsatoll ja teised. Õhtut juhib Üllar Saaremae.

programme.title: Minu kodu on parim
programme.desc: Võistluses on kuus paari, kes hakkavad unelmate auhinna nimel uksteise maju renoveerima. Igal tiimil on oma eelarve ja neile maaratakse konkreetne osa kaasvõistleja kodust ning aiast, mis tuleb võimalikult agedaks ja stiilseks muuta. Kuna selleks ettenahtud aeg on piiratud, seisavad võistlevad paarid silmitsi karmide valjakutsetega – lisaks lennukale fantaasiale ja kuldsetele katele paneb see proovile ka nende omavahelised suhted, sest pinge all kipuvad emotsioonid kontrolli alt valjuma. Esimesena võetakse kasile Jemma ja Beni ligi 70 aastat tagasi ehitatud maja.

programme.title: Vabariigi aastapaev. Estonia. Reporteri erisaade
programme.desc: Aastapaeva erisaade Estoniast, tõrvikurongkaigust, nii pidulauast kui ka nende juurest, kes tahtsa paeva auks tootavad. Glamuur ja fuusiline too astuvad sel õhtul kenasti koos.

programme.title: Telehommik
programme.desc: "Tere hommikust, Telehommik alustab," utlevad saatejuhid Kristjan Gold ja Romi Hasa teile Kanal 2 otsestuudiost. Kaasahaarav hommikuprogramm annab hommikule ja kogu paevale asjaliku ja praktilise ning huvitava ja positiivse stardi. Telehommik toob juba varahommikul vaatajani uudised ule Eesti!

programme.title: Võsavinkel
programme.desc: Millised ohud varitsevad harrastuskalamehi Peipsi jarve raksuval jaakoorikul? Kas oht mitte saada kala või sattuda vene piirivalve raudsesse haardesse? Peeter Võsa haarab mootorsaanil sabast ning sõidab koos kalastuslegend Hannoga idapiirile ahvenat puudma.

programme.title: Telehommik
programme.desc: "Tere hommikust, Telehommik alustab," utlevad saatejuhid Kristjan Gold ja Romi Hasa teile Kanal 2 otsestuudiost. Kaasahaarav hommikuprogramm annab hommikule ja kogu paevale asjaliku ja praktilise ning huvitava ja positiivse stardi. Telehommik toob juba varahommikul vaatajani uudised ule Eesti!

programme.title: Roaldi retked
programme.desc: Valismaale kolimine ei pruugi alati uks lust ja lillepidu olla ning seda on omal nahal tundnud ka Raplamaalt parit perekond Jõgi, kes kolis kaunile Sitsiilia saarele Itaaliasse juba 11 aastat tagasi. Roald Johannson leiab Vahemere-aarsest vaikelinnast Terrasinist uhe sitke Eesti pere, kes otsis abi humanitaarabist ja toidupankadest, kuid raskete aastate kiuste on neist saanud uhtehoidev ja ehe Sitsiilia perekond!

programme.title: Kodus ja võõrsil
programme.desc: Dana ja Xander lepivad ara. Irene agestub Leah peale. Levi puuab oma suutundest lahti saada.

programme.title: Monk
programme.desc: Monk peab poes tootades valja selgitama, miks kuu parim tootaja mõrvati.

programme.title: Magipaastjad
programme.desc: Franz laheb uksi magedesse matkama ja satub kukkudes hatta. Magipaastjas tormavad appi. Õnnetus ei hoia Franzu tagasi ja ta jatkab jargmisel paeval oma saladuslikku retke, mille sihti teab vaid Peter Herbrehter, kes laheb Franzuga kaasa otsima 60 aasta eest alla kukkunud lennukit. Mis saladus lennukis peitub?

programme.title: Saatuslik kiri
programme.desc: Asli hiilib Hatice tuppa, et tema telefonist infot hankida, ent jaab Haticele vahele. Asli mõistab, et tal on vaja end kuidagi esile tuua. Nuud elab uus Asli Karlide perega uhe katuse all. Kuigi see lahendab teda Mehmetiga, tekitab see Karlide peres probleeme juurde. Ziya raagib Seherile, et teab tõde kirjast.

programme.title: Leegitsev armastus
programme.desc: Öosel põleb maha turklasest omaniku autoremonditookoda, jattes mehe suurtesse võlgadesse. Linnas levib võõraviha ja vaest meest suudistatakse kindlustuspettuses. Marie puuab teda aidata. Philipp kolib Wildeggi, et Maxi paremini tundma õppida. Stefani ja Marie suhted pusivad jahedad.

programme.title: Naabriplika
programme.desc: Kirikõpetajal tekivad kahtlused selles suhtes, et kas maakera on ikka ummargune pall? Ja ta asub uurima lapiku maa teooriat. Kõigele krooniks peab vaene mees hakkama ka umber lukkama Darwini arenguteooriat, mis pole sugugi kerge ulesanne ka temasuguse targa mehe jaoks. Vesol on oma katsetega jõudnud punkti, kus ta seisab uue avastuse lavel. Vallavanem on hadas naisega, kes vajab uut liikumisvahendit ja kuigi Varik leiab hulkuva hobuse ning esialgu tundub probleem lahenduse leidvat, siiski võib taas tõdeda - naised ei tea kunagi, mida nad tahavad, aga kui nad midagi saavad, siis tahavad nad kohe midagi veel. Tola ja Aliina rasedus jõuab aga punkti, kus nad peavad hakkama koos sunnituskoolitusele mõtlema. Siinkohal satub nende teele nõustamisekspert ja kogenud koolitaja dr Kroosman.

programme.title: Reporter
programme.desc: Uudistemagasinide lipulaev, mis toob olulisemad ja põnevamad uudised kodumaalt ja mujalt maailmast vaatajateni Reporterile omasel mahlakal moel. Saatejuhid on alati soliidsed Jaanus Koort, Simon Suviste ja Tõnis Sarap.

programme.title: 15 kusimust
programme.desc: Kodumaine strateegiline malumang, mille muudab kaasahaaravaks põnev vihjete susteem ja strateegia element. Saates on vastamisi kaks mangijat, kel on võimalus hakata panustama enda tugevustele ning samal ajal vastase nõrkusele. Mõnikord võib selline tegutsemine edu tuua, aga teinekord hoopis katte maksta ning vajalikest punktidest ilma jatta. Saadet juhib Juri Butšakov.

programme.title: Taistund
programme.desc: Ajakirjanduslik paevakajasaade toob vaatajateni põhjalikult uuritud ja inimlahedased lood nii Eestist kui ka mujalt maailmast. Ajakirjanikud Elo Mõttus-Leppik, Sander Punamae, Mart Mardisalu, Neeme Raud, Raul Ranne ja Madis Kimmel kasitlevad uhiskonnas olulisi teemasid, mis tekitavad sageli laiemat diskussiooni ja aitavad esile tõsta lahendamist vajavad probleemid. Lisaks aktuaalsetele kusimustele avardab Taistund ka vaataja silmaringi, pakkudes sugavamaid arusaamu meid umbritsevast maailmast.

programme.title: Õhtu!
programme.desc: Meelelahutuslik ja manguline vestlussaade "Õhtu!" on seltsiks argiõhtutel. Saatejuhid Robert Rool ja Juri Butšakov ullatavad uute teemade, kulaliste ja mangudega ning muudavad toopaeva õhtud alati positiivseks ja heatujuliseks.

programme.title: Krimi
programme.desc: Eesti staažikaim politseisaade toob vaatajateni olulisemad krimiuudised. Uudiseid elu pahupoolelt vahendab saatejuht Taavi Otsus.

programme.title: Chicago politseijaoskond
programme.desc: Ülikooliprofessor jaab vahele heroiini smugeldamisega Kanadasse.

programme.title: FBI
programme.desc: FBI rahvusvahelise uksuse agendid reisivad mooda maailma, eesmargiga kaitsta ameeriklasi kõikjal, kus nad ka poleks.

programme.title: Õhtu!
programme.desc: Meelelahutuslik ja manguline vestlussaade "Õhtu!" on seltsiks argiõhtutel. Saatejuhid Robert Rool ja Juri Butšakov ullatavad uute teemade, kulaliste ja mangudega ning muudavad toopaeva õhtud alati positiivseks ja heatujuliseks.

Kõigele krooniks peab vaene mees hakkama ka umber lukkama Darwini arenguteooriat, mis pole sugugi kerge ulesanne ka temasuguse targa mehe jaoks. Tola ja Aliina rasedus jõuab aga punkti, kus nad peavad hakkama koos sunnituskoolitusele mõtlema. Siinkohal satub nende teele nõustamisekspert ja kogenud koolitaja dr Kroosman.
